############
Payment Page
############

In this section we will create the Payment Page for our E-Commerce Website - MyZone.in

***********
Requirement
***********
Let us have a look on the basic requirement of this page :

#. A background color.

#. A heading and the Product Name, Price and Quantity.

#. Payment Options, in which COD is enabled.

#. Form fields for Name, Contact Number, Email, Quantity, Total(which will be
calculated itself) and the Delivery address.

#. Number field should have proper valdation.

#. Quantity should be less than available in stock.
